headline: The Campbell’s Company Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., May 13, 2025--The Board of Directors of The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) (Campbell’s) today declared a regular quarterly dividend on the company’s capital stock of $0.39 per share. The quarterly dividend is payable Aug. 4, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business as of July 3, 2025.
